description: This file defines Express route handlers for API endpoints, including a 'Hello World' GET endpoint and CRUD operations for Employee records. It also contains Swagger API documentation comments describing the API schema and endpoints.

methods.name: router.get('/hello', (req, res) => {...})
methods.description: Handles GET requests to the '/hello' endpoint, returning a 'Hello World' text response.

methods.name: router.post('/employees', (req, res) => employeesController.create(req, res))
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new employee record via the employeesController.

methods.name: router.get('/employees', (req, res) => employeesController.list(req, res))
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list all employee records via the employeesController.
